array.name: prohibitedArray
array.item: The garden is a pedestrian area. The use of bicycles, rollerblades and skateboards is not allowed and the use of all private vehicles is prohibited ept by special permission.
Domestic animals, including dogs are not permitted. Guide dogs are the exception.
Please keep to the paved area of the main pond when feeding ducks.

array.name: seasonalArray
array.item: Summer: Herbaceous borders, Rose Garden, Rock Garden, Herb Garden, Geographic collection
Autumn: Deciduous trees, Arboretum, Azalea Garden
Winter: Australian Plants, early flowering Camellias, Winter Garden Glasshouse, Native Collection
Spring: Flowering cherry trees, spring bulbs, Rhododendron Dell
